original_title: Bir Keresinde Tüm Seans Boyunca Sustum
overview: Tuna is taking a course to become a writer. Under the influence of her mother, thinking it will benefit her, she starts psychotherapy. As she starts to tell about herself and what she is going through, she starts avoiding them. Her relationship with her roommate is also affected in the process.
title: Once I Kept Quiet For a Whole Session
